scripts.sass:build: sass --no-source-map sass/style.scss css/style.min.css --style=compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' css/style.min.css -o css/style.min.css
scripts.sass:watch: sass --no-source-map --watch sass/style.scss css/style.min.css --style=compressed | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 10 versions' css/style.min.css -o css/style.min.css
